entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear this evening and after midnight then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
